org.apache.hadoop.hbase.wal.AsyncFSWALProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
PeerActionListener, WALProvider
@Private @Evolving public class AsyncFSWALProvider extends AbstractFSWALProvider<AsyncFSWAL>
A WAL provider that use AsyncFSWAL.
